operation.name: digital-preservation-webarchiving-pagelyzer-changedetection
operation.description: Tool for detecting changes in web pages and their rendering

input.name: input_url1
input.description: URL of first webpage. The URL must include the "http://" schema

input.name: input_url2
input.description: URL of second webpage. The URL must include the "http://" schema

parameter.name: param_outputfolder
parameter.description: Output folder. Where the webpage snapshots, HTMLs, etc are stored. Default ~/pagelyzer/

parameter.name: param_browser
parameter.description: Browser instance used for both input webpages. Possible values are: firefox, chrome, iexploreproxy, safariproxy, opera. Default = firefox

parameter.name: param_browser1
parameter.description: Browser instance used for first webpage. Possible values are: firefox, chrome, iexploreproxy, safariproxy, opera. Default = firefox

parameter.name: param_browser2
parameter.description: Browser instance used for second webpage. Possible values are: firefox, chrome, iexploreproxy, safariproxy, opera. Default = firefox

stdout.description: Similarity distance is printed on standard out
